title: Calories in an Egg McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in an egg mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: McDonald's standard Egg McMuffin: toasted English muffin, folded egg, Canadian bacon, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: An Egg McMuffin provides ~310 kcal, 17 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Swap Canadian bacon for sausage patty

faqs.q: How many calories in an egg mcmuffin from McDonald's?
faqs.a: Approximately 310 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 17 g of protein per Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, around 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber from the English muffin.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Roughly 770 mg, mostly from the cheese and bacon.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie egg mcmuffin at home?
faqs.a: Yes, skip cheese and use turkey bacon to cut ~100 kcal.
